Package eu.smartdatalake.simsearch

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDataConnector
    Interface for connecting to data sources and querying them in-situ.
    IRequest
    Interface to the various requests (mount, remove, catalog, search).
    ISimSearch<K,V>
    Interface to specifying various types of similarity search queries against a dataset.
    IValueFinder<K,V>
    Interface for retrieving attribute values for a given object identifier.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assistant
    Auxiliary class that provides various helper methods.
    AttributeInfo
    Auxiliary class that provides information about the data sources (each named with their queryable column) available for similarity search operations.
    Constants
    Auxiliary class that defines basic default parameters.
    Coordinator
    Orchestrates multi-attribute similarity search and issues progressively ranked aggregated top-k results.
    DatasetIdentifier
    Provides identification for the data regarding a specific attribute available from a data source.
    DataSource
    Instantiates a connection to retrieve attribute values from one of the following possible data sources: (i) a path to a CSV file; or (ii) a JDBC connection pool; or (iii) an HTTP connection to a REST API.
    Logger
    Auxiliary class that keeps a log of executed operations.
    OutputWriter
    Auxiliary class that can be used to write search results to a file in CSV format.
    PartialResult<K,V>
    Auxiliary class representing a result from searching against a single attribute along with the resulting similarity score.
    Response
    Generic response involving notifications on submitted requests.
    Runner
    Main class for invoking execution of a multi-attribute similarity search request that issues ranked top-k results with aggregate scores.
    SearchHandler
    Handles a new multi-attribute similarity search request.
    SearchResponse
    Provides the complete response to a multi-attribute similarity search query, which encapsulates the search results and their similarity matrix.
